problems.title: Dead click hotspot on "img"
problems.description: Users are clicking on "img" expecting it to be interactive, but nothing happens. This creates frustration and confusion.
problems.recommendation: Make "img" interactive (clickable) or change its styling to not appear clickable.

problems.title: Rage clicking on "img"
problems.description: Users are rapidly clicking on "img" multiple times, indicating severe frustration. This element may be unresponsive or not working as expected.
problems.recommendation: Investigate why "img" is frustrating users. Check if it's slow to respond, broken, or not behaving as expected.

problems.title: Rage clicking on "button"
problems.description: Users are rapidly clicking on "button" multiple times, indicating severe frustration. This element may be unresponsive or not working as expected.
problems.recommendation: Investigate why "button" is frustrating users. Check if it's slow to respond, broken, or not behaving as expected.

problems.title: Users scrolling back and forth
problems.description: 100.0% of users repeatedly scroll up and down, indicating they're searching for something or are confused about page structure.
problems.recommendation: Improve content organization, add a table of contents or quick navigation, and ensure information is easy to find.

summary: Found 3 critical issues requiring immediate attention. 1 high-priority issue should be addressed soon. Total: 5 issues identified across 1 sessions.
